name: CHISDK
short_description:
CHISDK ( Cairo Higher Institute Software Development Kit )
It`s Open Source Project That Contains Huge SDK`S Inside It .

CHISDK Contains Following SDK`S :

- Presentation ( PDF , Word , Excel , Scheduler ) .
- Compilers ( C++ , C# , VB.Net , HTML , JavaScript ) .
- Image Processing ( Motion Detector ) .
- Unity3D ( Unity3D WebPlayer Integrated With Simple Project ) .
- Cropper Tool .
- Translation ( Text / Voice / Online ) English , Arabic , Many Languages ..
- File Compression ( *.CHIPackage ) .
- Diagram Editor .
- Artificial Intelligence ( Prolog Interpreters ) .
- Alarm ( Text / Voice ) .
- Security ( Screen Locker ) .
- Quick Note .
- Math And Polynomial Calculators .
- And More ....
summary: It`s Open Source Project That Contains Huge SDK`S Inside It.
